name: Last Resort (vikkers)
description:
A week long getaway in paradise turns into a fortnight of peril in this escape horror game. Explore the island resort by day, so when the sun sets, you can collect the totems to escape–but the island is different at night and the Jungle creeps closer.

Last Resort is a top-down free-roaming survival adventure set at a beautiful island resort that doubles as a prison for a demonic fiend.

How to Play:

  • Use arrow Keys to move
  • Press [spacebar] to attack
  • Pres [E] to interact
